banner_subtitle: Get a diagnosis, treatment plan, and prescription from original provider of quality mental care.
about_subtitle: Visit us at any time for diagnosis and treatment with our 24/7 online platform.
about_quote: Save time and money. Receive quality care, every time
expertise_subtitle: The experts at The Online Platform are all registered on the General Medical Council.
expertise_paragraph: Our customer service team is always available to listen and help. If you aren't satisfied, for any reason, we'll refund your cost. Because we believe happiness is a big part of good health.
cta_subtitle: Strengthen your mental health and get 20% off our premium Membership for the first month!
footer_paragraph: It's not too good to be true, it's just the way healthcare should be simple.
